amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the freight program small project set aside from 10 percent to 20 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to increase the freight program small project set aside from 10 percent to 20 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 263 (Roll no. 592).

action.text: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
